content: Who originally said, "The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams"?

That quote is often attributed to Eleanor Roosevelt, but there's some debate about its origin. Some sources suggest that it might have been inspired by a similar statement made by Eleanor Roosevelt, while others believe it may have been created by motivational speakers or writers. It's always a good idea to verify the source of famous quotes, as attributions can sometimes be unclear or misattributed over time.
